rooms.description: Spacious living area with Bohemian decor featuring vibrant colors and eclectic furniture.
Adjacent to the living room for a seamless dining experience.
Modern kitchen with an island counter and open layout to connect with the courtyard.
Master bedroom with ensuite bathroom, oriented for optimal Vastu alignment.
Secondary bedroom positioned to harness natural light and calm energy.
Additional bedroom ensuring privacy with a view of the courtyard.
Cozy library space for reading and study, incorporating Vastu principles for concentration.
Entry hall designed with Bohemian elements and a welcoming ambiance.

openings.description: Double door entrance facilitating easy entry from the street, oriented as per Vastu.
Large windows to maximize natural light and enhance energy flow.
Strategically placed windows ensuring optimal air circulation according to local norms.
Open access from the living room to the central courtyard, promoting natural ventilation.

features.description: Fountain or small pond enhancing positive energy and aesthetics.
Indigenous plants arranged for Vastu compatibility and natural cooling.

courtyard.description: Central courtyard designed as a green space, ensuring connection with nature and adherence to local building norms.

rooms.description: Additional bedroom on the upper level for enhanced privacy and Vastu harmony.
Master bedroom with a balcony overlooking the courtyard, incorporating Bohemian elements and natural light.

openings.description: Balcony windows designed to maximize sunlight and fresh air, aligning with Vastu principles.
Staircase door linking the two floors for smooth circulation.
